attributes.action: UK public to be provided with daily location updates regarding Covid19 spread.
attributes.additional_details: Provide daily location updates for Covid19. Publish an online map visually displaying confirmed cases. Increase public awareness via daily news, media and marketing strategies.
attributes.background: Publish live location data when new cases are confirmed for ultimate transparency. Without this data being made available daily the UK - civil unrest potential is higher, panic increase can be expected and the UK public loses government trust.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Chief Medical Officer has confirmed that daily updates will continue.

You can read his remarks during an appearance before the Health Select Committee at https://committees.parliament.uk/work/81/preparations-for-coronavirus/publications/
